text: Mabuhay from it's my 29th visit to my
favorite country in the world and today
I'm at the beautiful my own volcano in
the Gaza you may only think I love the
Philippines because my girlfriend Deanna
is from here but I fell in love with her
country years before we fell in love
since my first trip here back in 2014
this video is dedicated to explaining
why the Philippines is my favorite
country on earth it can be broken down
into five categories the people the
nature the lifestyle the affordability
and the fresh fruit Filipinos are the
absolute friendliest people in the world
they're always smiling at you asking how
your day is and the best part which
makes it easy to get around
I always feel welcomed in this country
did you know that about 500 islands were
recently revealed so now the total
island count in the Philippines is seven
thousand six hundred and forty-one my
favorites are seeking hora jia jiao and
Philon but just about every island has
views like this like this and like this
and have I mentioned chocolate hills
waterfalls and volcanoes
Filipino time is an actual thing because
nobody is ever in a hurry here
everything is very relaxed and if you
need to get somewhere jump in a jeepney
or on a tricycle and just go with the
flow it's impossible to be bored here
the Philippines is one of the cheapest
countries in Southeast Asia you can get
a domestic flight for 20 bucks a
one-hour massage for four dollars and a
fresh coconut for 20 cents however if
you venture into manila's Makati or
techique districts things can get pricey
the tropical weather with year-round
sunshine and warm temperatures make a
perfect climate for growing all kinds of
fruit my favourites are bananas ube
watermelon and mango and the best
dessert in the world is called hollow
hollow shaved ice with mixed fruit and
coconut these are just five of a million
reasons why I love the Philippines so
much and when I call this country my
second home if you ever find yourself in
Southeast Asia you need to make this the
very first place on your list
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
